snippet.title: Old People in Space
snippet.description: Sending senior citizens on an all-expense paid, one-way ticket to oblivion will reduce the deficit without raising taxes.

snippet.title: January 7, 2004 - Elijah Wood
snippet.description: Jon expresses his concerns about the controversy between two women feuding over a lottery ticket. Move over SARS, mad cow disease hits the U.S. NASA successfully lands the rover Spirit on Mars, and Rob Corddry reports live from the angry red planet....

snippet.title: Week of 8/13/12 - Silverman, Smoove, Schumer, May
snippet.description: JB Smoove, Amy Schumer and Ralphie May weigh in on the Olympics; Sarah Silverman takes some Friendly Fire; Jeff hits the streets to roast meter maids.

snippet.title: Patton Oswalt: Finest Hour
snippet.description: Patton Oswalt finds humor in absurd real-life events, such as a run-in with crack addicts, an encounter with the Zorro of vomit bag users and a trip to the Spam Museum.
